features: Network Metrics Analysis Module - Complete implementation with 7 centrality metrics
Interactive DataTable with all node metrics (sortable, searchable, filterable)
Network visualizations (bar plots, scatter plots, histograms with statistics)
Key node identification (Top 5 for each metric: Degree, Betweenness, Closeness, PageRank)
Excel export with 2 sheets (Node Metrics + Network Metrics)
Comprehensive metrics guide with explanations and use cases
Confidence property system (1-5 scale) with visual feedback
Collapsible sidebar for CLD visualization with toggle button
About dialog with comprehensive version and system information
Interactive confidence filtering with slider control
Global constants for consistent configuration (DRY principle)
Comprehensive testing framework (174 tests total, all passing)
Enhanced user experience with smooth animations
